messages.message:
Hey, I remember you telling me way back that the NAU Hub was still up.  Everytime I search for it, it won't come up.  Do you have the exact IP address?

Brad

Brian
It's definitely still nauhub.dyndns.org but you can't open it off campus and if you are behind a router you have to use the port forwarding in the settings of your router and for DC++.  You can run a trace on that domain if you really want but i dont know the IP of it.
